TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示公共字段或属性在 序列化或反序列化包含它们的对象时表示 XML 元素。

span.span: Indicates that a public field or property represents an XML element when the serializes or deserializes the object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). XML 文档通常包含 XML 元素，其中每个包含三个部分： 带有可能的特性的开始标记、 结束标记和标记之间的数据。An XML document usually contains XML elements, each of which consists of three parts: an opening tag with possible attributes, a closing tag, and the data between the tags. XML 标记可以嵌套的即，标记之间的数据也可以是 XML 元素。XML tags can be nested--that is, the data between tags can also be XML elements. 包含另一个元素的容量使文档能够包含的数据层次结构。This capacity of one element to enclose another allows the document to contain hierarchies of data. 一个 XML 元素还可以包括属性。An XML element can also include attributes. 应用到公用字段或公共读/写属性来控制如元素名称和命名空间的 XML 元素的特征。Apply the to public fields or public read/write properties to control characteristics of the XML elements such as the element name and namespace. 可以应用多次于返回的对象数组的字段。The can be applied multiple times to a field that returns an array of objects. 这样做的目的是指定 (通过属性) 可以插入到数组的不同类型。The purpose of this is to specify (through the property) different types that can be inserted into the array. 例如，下面的 C# 代码中的数组接受字符串和整数。For example, the array in the following C# code accepts both strings and integers. ``` public class Things{ [XmlElement(Type = typeof(string)), XmlElement(Type = typeof(int))] public object[] StringsAndInts; } ``` 这会导致可能如下所示的 XML。This results in XML that might resemble the following. ``` Hello 999 World ``` 请注意，当你将应用多次而无需指定属性值的元素命名的可接受的对象的类型。Note that when you apply the multiple times without specifying an property value, the elements are named after the type of the acceptable objects. 如果将应用于字段或属性返回一个数组，数组中的项进行编码为 XML 元素的序列。If you apply the to a field or property that returns an array, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of XML elements. 与此相反如果则不会应用于此类字段或属性，该数组中的项被编码为的元素，嵌套在命名的字段或属性的元素序列。In contrast if an is not applied to such a field or property, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of elements, nested under an element named after the field or property. (使用和属性来控制如何序列化数组。)(Use the and attributes to control how an array is serialized.) 你可以设置属性指定的类型，它是派生自的原始的字段或属性--类型、 字段或属性已应用。You can set the property to specify a type that is derived from the type of the original field or property--that is, the field or property to which you have applied the . 如果字段或属性返回，你可以将应用的多个实例给的成员。If a field or property returns an , you can apply multiple instances of the to the member. 对于每个实例，设置到一种可以插入到数组的对象的属性。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用 word`XmlElement`中你的代码而不是较长。You can use the word `XmlElement` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`，并将应用对多个其成员。The following example serializes a class named `Group` and applies the to several of its members. 名为的字段`Employees`返回的数组`Employee`对象。The field named `Employees` returns an array of `Employee` objects. 在这种情况下，指定生成的 XML 将不嵌套的 （这是一个数组中的项的默认行为）。In this case, the specifies that the resulting XML will not be nested (which is the default behavior of items in an array). [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string elementName) cil managed

param.name: elementName
param.span: 序列化成员的 XML 元素名。

span.span: The XML element name of the serialized member.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当序列化的类实例的成员名称用作 XML 元素名称。By default, the uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance. 例如，名为的字段`Vehicle`生成名为一个 XML 元素`Vehicle`。For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`. 但是如果你需要一个不同的元素，比如`Cars`，将它传递`elementName`参数。However if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个简单的类包含名为的单个字段`Vehicles`。The following example shows a simple class that contains a single field named `Vehicles`. 该示例将应用给字段并包括`elementName`参数，从而指示生成 XML 元素名"汽车"为而不是"车辆"。The example applies the to the field and includes the `elementName` parameter, thereby instructing the to generate XML elements named "Cars" rather than "Vehicles". [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 从该成员的类型派生的对象的 。

span.span: The of an object derived from the member's type.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 所应用到的成员的类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies a type for the member to which the is applied.

summary.span: 此类型在序列化或反序列化包含它的对象时由 使用。

span.span: This type is used by the when serializing or deserializing object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`type`参数来指定从基类派生的类型。Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class. 例如，假设一个名为属性`MyAnimal`返回`Animal`对象。For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object. 你想要增强该对象，因此你创建一个名为的新类`Mammal`继承自`Animal`类。You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class. 若要指示接受`Mammal`类在其序列化时`MyAnimal`属性、 传递的`Mammal`给构造函数的类。To instruct the to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the of the `Mammal` class to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Orchestra`，其中包含名为的单个字段`Instruments`，它返回的数组`Instrument`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为第二个类`Brass`继承自`Instrument`类。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例将应用到`Instruments`字段，并指定`Brass`类型，从而允许`Instruments`字段以接受`Brass`对象。The example applies the to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects. 该示例还指定 XML 元素的名称通过设置属性。The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称和 应用到的成员的派生类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the and specifies the name of the XML element and a derived type for the member to which the is applied.

summary.span: 此成员类型在 序列化包含它的对象时使用。

span.span: This member type is used when the serializes the object that contains it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当序列化的类实例的成员名称用作 XML 元素名称。By default, the uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance. 例如，名为的字段`Vehicle`生成名为一个 XML 元素`Vehicle`。For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`. 但是，如果你需要一个不同的元素，比如`Cars`，将它传递`elementName`参数。However, if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter. 使用`type`参数来指定从基类派生的类型。Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class. 例如，假设一个名为属性`MyAnimal`返回`Animal`对象。For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object. 你想要增强该对象，因此你创建一个名为的新类`Mammal`继承自`Animal`类。You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class. 若要指示接受`Mammal`类在其序列化时`MyAnimal`属性、 传递的`Mammal`给构造函数的类。To instruct the to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the of the `Mammal` class to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Orchestra`，其中包含名为的单个字段`Instruments`，它返回的数组`Instrument`对象。The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为第二个类`Brass`继承自`Instrument`类。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例将应用到`Instruments`字段，并指定`Brass`类型，从而允许`Instruments`字段以接受`Brass`对象。The example applies the to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects. 该示例还指定 XML 元素的名称通过设置属性。The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.XmlElementAttribute2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 生成的 XMl 元素的 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition (XSD) data type of the XML element generated by the .

value.span: “XML 架构”数据类型，如名为“XML 架构第 2 部分：数据类型”的“万维网联合会”(www.w3.org) 文档中所定义。

span.span: An XML Schema data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 XML 架构的简单数据类型及其.net 等效项。The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their.NET equivalents. XML 架构`base64Binary`和`hexBinary`数据类型使用的数组结构，并应用与设置为"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"根据需要。For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. XML 架构`time`和`date`数据类型，使用键入并应用与设置为"日期"或"时间"。For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于每种 XML 架构类型，映射到一个字符串，将应用于与其属性设置为 XML 架构类型。For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XML Schema type. 很可能这可能会更改的序列化格式，不仅成员的架构。It is possible that this can change the serialization format, not only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 因此你必须将其设置完全符合 XML 架构数据类型之一，该属性是区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 传递元素是比将其传递为一个 XML 架构属性更高效。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML Schema attribute. 有关 XML 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅名为"XML 架构第 2： 数据类型"World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档。For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes". |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|数组对象Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |实体ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|数组对象Array of objects| |IdID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整数integer|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |nameName|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持续时间duration|| |字符串string|| |shortshort|| |时间time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`，其中包含名为的字段`ExtraInfo`，它将返回。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `ExtraInfo`, which returns an . 该示例将应用的两个实例给字段并指定不同每个实例的值。The example applies two instances of the to the field and specifies different values for each instance. 每个实例使要序列化插入到数组的指定的类型。Each instance enables the to serialize the specified types inserted into the array. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 已指定的 XML 架构数据类型无法映射到 .NET 数据类型。

span.span: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the.NET data type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ElementName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ElementName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.

value.span: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the generated XML element.
The default is the member identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定如果要生成的 XML 元素，该成员的标识符名称不同的名称。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier. 你可以将设置为相同如果生成的 XML 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分具有相同名称的成员对多个类成员值。You can set the same value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members. 有关如何在 XML 文档中使用命名空间和前缀的名称的详细信息，请参阅类。For details on how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性为新值。The following example sets the property of an to a new value. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm Form { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm value); };
member this.Form : System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素是否是限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否限定或非限定 XML 元素。The property determines whether an XML element is qualified or unqualified. 属性符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 1999年规范，"XML 命名空间"。The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) 1999 specification, "Namespaces in XML". 如果属性设置为任何值，尝试设置属性`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认设置， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，指示检查要确定是否为限定命名空间的 XML 文档的架构。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果架构未指定的值的单个元素或属性，使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`值以确定是否为限定元素或属性。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 下面的 XML 代码演示一个架构：The following XML code shows a schema: ``` ``` 当读取架构，值都`Name`和`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`将限定元素而时`Number`元素是非限定。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`。The following example sets the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsNullable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将设置为 的成员序列化为 属性设置为 的空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member that is set to as an empty tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档以显式指示缺少元素的内容时。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含属性`xsi:nil`设置为`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 规范中，"XML 架构第 1 部分： 结构"。For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "XML Schema Part 1: Structures". 如果属性设置为`true`、`xsi:nil`属性为已设置为的类成员生成`null`。If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果你设置名为的字段`MyStringArray`到`null`、生成以下 XML 代码。For example if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果属性是`false`，为已设置为的类成员会生成任何 XML 元素`null`。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. > [!NOTE] > 不能将应用指向成员的属性类型为值类型，因为值类型不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. 此外，不能将此属性设置为`false`为可以为 null 的值类型。Additionally, you cannot set this property to `false` for nullable value types. 当这样的类型为`null`，它们会通过设置序列化`xsi:nil`到`true`。When such types are `null`, they will be serialized by setting `xsi:nil` to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示具有字段应用于该对象与属性设置为`false`。The following example shows a field with the applied to it, and the property set to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给 XML 元素的命名空间，这些 XML 元素是在序列化类时得到的。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace assigned to the XML element that results when the class is serialized.
The namespace of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 规范，"XML 命名空间"。The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "Namespaces in XML". 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间，必须创建，包含的命名空间和前缀的 XML 文档中使用。To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 为每个设置命名空间，它必须匹配中的命名空间之一。As you set the namespace for each , it must match one of the namespaces in the . 当生成 XML 时，每个数组是正确加上与指定的命名空间关联的前缀。When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Order : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化或反序列化元素的显式顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
The order of the code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用枚举，以指示生成设置的代码属性。Use the enumeration to instruct the to generate code that sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一次已被属性使用一个公共属性或类型中的字段上，必须应用到所有公共属性和该类型以及所有继承的类型的字段。Once the property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };
member this.Type : Type with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于表示 XML 元素的对象类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the object type used to represent the XML element.
The of the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的字段或属性的派生的类型。Use the property to specify a derived type for a field or property. 如果字段或属性返回，你可以将应用的多个实例给的成员。If a field or property returns an , you can apply multiple instances of the to the member. 对于每个实例，设置到一种可以插入到数组的对象的属性。For each instance, set the property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性指定的派生的对象。The following example uses the property to specify a derived object for an . 该示例还将应用的三个实例到返回的字段。The example also applies three instances of the to a field that returns an . 每个实例指定字段中允许的类型。Each instance specifies a type allowed in the field. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlElementAttribute.Type Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
